author: wrowe
msg: Backport, even to 1.3, the ability to build under devenv
of Visual Studio 2005.  Endorse -f syntax to get folks

author: wrowe
msg: Test _NMAKE_VER define to determine nmake -nologo behavior,
and use $(MAKEOPT) -f syntax throughout to avoid problems
Claiming platform maintainer privs to just fix this for VS2005
